name: A Year of Making Life Beautiful book
description:
Wouldn't you love to spend a year in the country? Join designer Melissa Stramel for 45 beautiful projects to bake, grow, craft, and sew. Includes 12 quilt patterns, 14 recipes, 10 crafts, 4 exclusive embroidery patterns, and several more sewing patterns. There are also projects and tips for the garden.

In addition, learn the art of canning, how-tos for organizing, step by step hand quilting, arranging flowers and much, much more.

Choose from project-friendly spiral bound or hardcover. Hardcover is a limited edition available from Melissa Stramel only.

Published by QuiltWoman.com. 84 pages

name: Mommy, Dolly and Me Aprons
description:
Skill Level: Beginner
Make a whole family of aprons. Here’s an apron pattern sure to get you and your little bakers into the kitchen. The apron pattern covers little girls sizes 2T - 12 and Mommys (or Grandmas, Aunties and friends) from misses size small to plus sizes. It also includes a doll pattern for 18” dolls! Just choose the half or full apron and then make them to match OR mix it up for a designer look.

name: Quilters Rule!
description:
Skill level: Advanced Beginner 
Finished Size: 17” x 28”
It’s time to get organized! Get started with a case that will hold all your quilting rulers as well as notions. It perfect for traveling to quilt retreats but equally handy for keeping all your rulers together when you’re at home. No more searching for the lost one!

name: Cherished Girl's Dress Pattern
description:
Skill Level: Advanced Beginner
A handmade dress can become a family heirloom. Create this one-of-a-kind dress in fun fabrics for any little girls, sizes 2T to 10. It's perfect for school or play. Detailed instructions for every step are included. This is the dress she will cherish. 

This is an actual paper pattern. For e-patterns, please return to the main menu.

name: the Joy bag pattern
description:
Skill Level: Advanced Beginner

Spread your joy with the Joy bag! This is the perfect bag for everyday or for a night on the town. Have fun learning to make pleats! Choose from two sizes and with or without a stripe. You can even mix it up and pick three or four colors. Then you're ready to get started. Also makes a quick gift for your favorite friend.

This is an actual paper pattern, mailed to you. For e-patterns, please return to the main menu.
